Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (23, 17), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.

- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking":"現在、敵空母はマップの左上(3,3)近傍にいる可能性が高い。まずは航空部隊を発艦させ、索敵を行う。空母は敵に発見されないように慎重に移動する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":21,"y":15},"launch_target":{"x":10,"y":10}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (10, 10) while at (21, 15).

- Your carrier BC1: position (22, 15), en route to target (21, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (21, 15), outbound toward (10, 10), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking":"BSQ1は索敵を続けている。敵空母の位置を特定するため、BSQ2を別の方向に発艦させる。空母は慎重に移動し、敵に発見されないようにする。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":20,"y":13},"launch_target":{"x":12,"y":8}}}
